Reviews.Title: LOVE my new camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Dana L. Aydelotte "Dana A."
Reviews.Content: This camera (and camera package) is AMAZING!!! It does tons of stuff from taking amazing pictures to photo shopping on the camera itself! It completely rocks! So much so, that when I took it to work to show off, a coworker purchased the exact same kit in a different color! Family members are even looking into buying this camera kit! You will not regret this purchase!

ProductInfo.Features:
DSC-TX30/B Pink 18.2MP Water, Dust, Freeze, and Shockproof Digital Camera
32 MB Micro SD Memory Card, Compact Digital Camera Deluxe Carrying Case
NP-BN1 1150 mAh Battery, Hi-Speed SD USB 2.0 Card Reader
Floating Wrist Strap - Orange, Flexible Mini Table-top Tripod
Screen Protectors for LCD's (pack of 3), 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-TX30/P DSC-TX30 TX30 D DSCTX30 DSCTX30P 18 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 3.3-Inch OLED (Pink) Bundle with 32GB Card, Spare Battery, Card Reader, Floating Strap, Carrying Case+ More
